recipesJson.name: Ckemist Original: Loupe
recipesJson.author: Ckemist
recipesJson.description:
This steeps into a magical melon rum candy vape. 

It may be the best Recipe I ever made. 
Mix It and let me know.

reviews.text: Excellent recipe. A flavor combination that sounds pretty strange, but is simply delicious. The cantaloupe becomes a perfect, smooth creamy compliment with the butter rum. Thanks Ckemist!
